column2: ENGLISH
Request Aid from Elector Counts
In the time of need Elector Counts are meant to provide Emperor with their forces.
Is asked about to help in war.
Cast Heal
Attempt to manipulate Hysh to heal the people from injuries and illness.
Banish Demon
Use white wind of magic to anish the demon from the body of a person.
A character possessed by the Daemon must be in reach.
Summon Blizzard
Summon a blizzard to slow march of your enemies.
Raise Ice walls
Raises an ice wall from the ground.
Cast Biting Wind
Unleash a icestorm and biting winds upon enemies.
Ice walls cannot be raised in province holdings.
Dark magic
Attempt to cast dark magic spells.
Lore of Fire
Attempt to manipulate Aqushy the red wind of magic.
Raise the Army of Undead
Performs a ritual of great power raising undead legion.
Cast Wind of Death
Summons the Wind of Death - which sucks the life from the the living in area.
Requires enormous magical power and hundreds of human corpses. Province must be controlled by character.
Requires trendemous magical power. Will kill large amount of population - cannot be used in the same province twice. Province must be controlled by character.
Open the spellbook
Shows the available spells
Close the spellbook
Closes the spellbook
Reveal yourself as chaos worshipper
Reveal yourself as chaos worshipper
Fight against Chaos!
Join the holy war against Chaos forces that are traspassing your lands.
Requires Chaos army trasspasing your lands.
Call for help against forces of Chaos
Sends a call for help to every ruler of forces of order.
Help has not been called
